title: Bolgoda edge Land For Sale
details:
155 Perch Bare Land on Edge of BOLGODA Lake

*Just 2 kms from old bridge on Moratuwa/Panadura Road

* Mains supply of Water & Electricity

* Situated on two levels with amazing trees

* Ideal for Commercial development


PRICE: Rs. 800,000/- Per Perch.( Negotiable)
